data.description: A notable person from history with significant impact on politics, science, arts, or society. Includes their background, achievements, personality, and historical context.

dimensions.description: The year the historical figure was born.
dimensions.name: Birth Year

dimensions.description: The year the historical figure passed away.
dimensions.name: Death Year

dimensions.description: The primary area in which the historical figure made their mark (e.g., politics, science, arts).
dimensions.name: Field of Influence

dimensions.description: Key accomplishments that define the historical figure's legacy.
dimensions.name: Major Achievements

dimensions.description: Notable personality characteristics of the historical figure.
dimensions.name: Personality Traits

dimensions.description: The extent to which the historical figure influenced culture and society.
dimensions.name: Cultural Impact

dimensions.description: Any controversial actions or beliefs associated with the historical figure.
dimensions.name: Controversial Aspects

dimensions.description: The socio-political environment during the historical figure's lifetime.
dimensions.name: Historical Context

data.name: Historical Figure
